alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:24AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pondera, eastern Glacier and west central Toole Counties through NOON MDT... At 1123 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Cut Bank, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cut Bank. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 237 and 260. Highway 89 between mile markers 88 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
